Хосиятхон молодая и жизнерадостная женщина. Она родилась в семье преподавателя. Она всегда мечтала получить высшее образование, но так как ее родители не имели достаточно денег, чтобы оплачивать за ее учебу в университете, она не смогла поступить в университет. Хосиятхон вышла замуж. Теперь она должна зарабатывать на жизнь, так как ее муж имеет маленький доход. Так как она не имеет высшего образования, она не может поступить на работу за приличный оклад. Она решила организовать свой бизнес. 
С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес скотоводством, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hosiyatkhon is a young and cheerful woman. She was born in a family of teachers. She always dreamed of getting a higher education, but since her parents do not have enough money to pay for her tuition she was unable to enroll in a university. Hosiyatkhon got married. Now, she must earn a living since her husband has a small salary. Since she does not have a higher education, she can not get a job for a decent salary. She decided to establish her own business. 

With this aim, she took a course "Bring It On" organized by the Association of Business Women. Now, she is fully able to organize her own business and become successful in this sphere. She wants to establish a livestock business, since she has experience in this kind of work. 

She is requesting a loan of US$3,000 to buy livestock in order to establish a new business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La cliente reside en la zona de Isla en Guayaquil.  Empezó tiempo atrás con la venta de ropa y cosméticos, posteriormente con su esposo emprendieron en la pintada de fachadas de casas y limpieza.  Esta actividad les resulta muy productiva y les agrada muchísimo.  Labora junto con su esposo, todos los días, de 9 am a 4:30 pm.  Es casada y su cónyuge es pintor profesional.  Tiene 2 hijos, quienes asisten a la escuela fiscal del sector.  A futuro, le gustaría disfrutar junto a su familia y que Dios le de salud para seguir adelante progresando.  Ahora necesita el crédito para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en: This client lives in Guayaquil’s Isla zone.  She started some time ago selling clothes and cosmetics and later on she and her husband started painting and cleaning house facades.  This activity is quite profitable and she enjoys it very much.  She works alongside her husband every day from 9am until 4:30pm.  She’s married and her husband’s a professional painter.  She has two children attending the local public school.  In future, she hopes to enjoy her family and that God gives her health to continue making progress.  She needs the loan now to buy raw materials.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Kadiatou

texts.fr:
Né vers 1967 à KOLONDIEBA Ville chef-lieu de la dite commune (3ème Région administrative du Mali), KADIATOU  y réside avec ses 3 enfants et son mari dans une famille nucléaire.
 Mme KADIATOU s’est vite intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de céréales.  Elle est très sollicitée au marché de Kolondièba et surtout le jour de foire. 
Fort de ses 7 années d’expériences dans le domaine, elle collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  dixième prêt, après avoir remboursé les prêts précédents. 
KADIATOU compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des céréales. Elle s’approvisionne chez les producteurs dans les villages avoisinants. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant et quelques fois à crédit au marché à  des hommes.
KADIATOU espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 110.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en:
Kadiatou was born around 1967 in Kolondieba, the administrative center of the municipality that bears the same name (Mali’s third-largest administrative region), and now lives there with her husband and three children in a nuclear family.
 
Kadiatou quickly became interested in profit-making activities, particularly the purchase and sale of cereals. She is highly sought-after at the market in Kolondièba, particularly on fair days. She has seven years of experience in this field, and is collaborating with Soro Yiriwaso to increase her working capital so that she can meet the demands of her ever-growing customer base. She is on her 10th loan with the institution, having successfully repaid her prior loans.

Kadiatou plans to use her loan to buy cereals. She gets her supplies from farmers in the neighboring villages, and makes her sales on a cash (and sometimes credit) basis to male customers in the market. Kadiatou hopes to make a monthly profit of 110,000 Francs CFA, which she will use to provide for her family, repay her loan, and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy cereals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of food supplements

loans.name: Jorge Arturo

texts.es: Jorge de 30 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos pequeños hijos. Tiene 6 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, principalmente al cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Además, compra y vende verduras en el mercado de su localidad. Su principal posesión es su humilde y sencilla casa la cual desea hacerle algunas mejoras. Actualmente, su casa no cuenta con un corredor y cuando llueve el agua se filtra, de igual forma en las tardes el sol molesta y arruina sus pocas pertenencias. Con el fin de solucionar este problema, solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, ladrillo y cemento de tal forma que le permita construir el corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jorge, 30, lives with his life companion and two small children.  He’s been working in agriculture mainly growing corn and beans six years.  Also, he buys and sells vegetables in the local market.  

His main asset is his humble, simple abode that he wants to make improvements to.  His house currently lacks a front porch and when it rains water leaks in.  In addition, in the afternoon the sun is bothersome and it ruins his few possessions.

To solve this problem, he has asked FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, bricks and cement to build a porch at home.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Erick Stanley

texts.es: Erick de 22 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su sobrina de 7 años. Tiene tres años de trabajar en transporte público como cobrador y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humilde y su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su casa. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción de la energía eléctrica en su casa ya que en la actualidad no cuenta con dicho servicio. Con lo que gana en su trabajo pagará la deuda.
texts.en:
Erick, 22, lives with his 7-year-old niece in a house that’s his.  He’s been employed three years as a public transportation fare collector and this is how he supports his home.  He lives under very humble conditions and his dream is to make home improvements.  

He’s decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to install electric power at home since it currently lacks said service.  He will repay the loan with earnings from work.

loans.use: to install electricity at home.

loans.name: Gazment

texts.en:
Gazment has been running his agricultural business for about 10 years. He plants, harvests and sells his fresh produce with the vehicle that he’s been photographed with. He wants to buy potato seeds with the loan that he is requesting. 
“Having your own transportation van makes it so much easier; you can go to cities any time to sell your products. Otherwise you would wait for wholesale buyers and see this as not a very reliable source. Sometimes, while villagers wait for those buyers to come, their products get rotten altogether,” said Gazment. Gazment is 35 years old and has three young children; the oldest is 12 and the youngest is 2. They live in southeastern Albania and their region is known for the best potatoes.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Leonor works hard to support her family; she is married, and has a business in direct selling personal collections and Natasha products in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years.

Leonor requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of personal collections and Natasha products to sell.

In the future, Leonor would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of personal collection and Natasha products to sell

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañera de vida y sus hijos de 10 años, 5 años y 3 años de edad.  Rafael trabaja como mecánico y pintor en un taller de su localidad, en el cual lleva 10 años de ser empleado. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar y junto a su esposa  van sacando adelante a su familia. Desea reparar el muro perimetral de su casa ya que actualmente es de lámina y no es muy seguro, además ya está deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena de tal forma que pueda darle mayor seguridad a su familia y sus pocas pertenencias.
texts.en:
Rafael, 33, lives in his own house with his life partner and their children who are ages 10, 5, and 3. Rafael has been working as a mechanic and painter for 10 years in a workshop in his town. In this way, he provides for his home and he and his wife together are getting their family ahead. 

Rafael is hoping to repair the wall around his house since it is currently made of metal sheets and isn’t very secure. It is also deteriorating. Because of this, he is requesting this loan from Fusai to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand so he can give his family and their few possessions more security.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand to construct a wall around his home.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, tiene 30 años de edad está soltero, vive con sus padres, desde hace un año tiene un negocio que consiste en una tienda de artículos de primera necesidad y un chalet donde vende comida;  trabaja a tiempo completo,  es apoyado por su madre en el manejo de ambas actividades. Hasta el momento no se le ha presentado ninguna dificultad y sabido mantener activo su negocio. 
Solicita un crédito para invertirlo en surtir más su negocio, ofrecerle un mejor ambiente se servicio a sus clientes; él comprara azúcar, arroz, frijol, aceite, bebidas, etc., tanto para la tienda como para utilizarlos en su venta de comida.
Su propósito es ampliar su negocio, servirle mucho mejor a sus clientes, generar más ganancias que serán utilizadas para pagar la deuda y mejorar las condiciones de vida de él y sus padres.
texts.en:
José, 30, is single and lives with his parents. For a year, he has had a business where he sells staple products and prepared food. He works full time and his mother helps him with both activities. So far, he has not had difficulties and has managed to keep his business running.

He is requesting a loan to invest in his business and offer his customers a better service. He will buy sugar, rice, beans, oil and beverages, among other things, both for the store and to prepare the food he sells. His plan is to expand his business, offer a better service and generate more profits in order to pay back the loan and improve his and his parents’ living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sigar, rice, beans, oil and beverages for his store and to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Nuria Judith

texts.es: Nuria de 19 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Es una joven caracterizada por ser muy trabajadora, emprendedora y responsable. Ella se gana la vida vendiendo ropa para bebe y adultos. El negocio lo tiene dentro de su casa de habitación, en donde también vende golosinas y refrescos. Actualmente, el techo de su casa se encuentra en malas condiciones ya que el sol y las lluvias lo han enmohecido y se ha picado lo cual no logra retener el agua cuando llueve. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de  tres docenas de lámina galvanizada que le permita hacer la reparación del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Nuria, 19, lives with her family in a house of her own.  This young woman is noted for being very hardworking, enterprising and responsible.  She earns her living selling clothes for infants and adults.  Her business is home-based and she also sells snacks and soft-drinks there.

The roof is currently in bad condition because the sun and the rains have rusted it so that it no longer keeps water out when it rains.  This is the reason why she’s asked FUSAI for this loan to buy three dozen galvanized metal sheets that will make it possible for her to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair her roof.

loans.name: Dina Elizabeth

texts.es: Dina tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar desde hace 7 años. Dina se dedica a la compra y venta de granos básicos tales como: maíz, frijol y maicillo. De esta forma colabora en la economía del hogar. Con el fin de brindar mejores condiciones a su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera ya que el techo se encuentra dañado por causa del viento, el sol y las lluvias. Espera contar con este apoyo y hacer los cambios lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Dina is 35 years old and has been living in her own house with her family for the past 7 years.  Dina makes her living buying and selling staple foods such as:  corn, beans and sorghum.  In this way, she contributes to the household finances.

With the goal of providing her family with better living conditions, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets and wood, since her roof is damaged because of the wind, sun and rains.  She hopes to get this support to make the changes as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets and wood to renovate the roof of her house.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 54 años de edad, es casado y habita junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 13 y 15 años de edad. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y él presta servicios como ordenanza desde hace dos años. Su casa es muy humilde pero está muy contento porque es propia y tiene plena confianza que poco a poco logrará ir mejorando sus condiciones. Desea construir una pila para el almacenamiento del agua ya que por el momento no tiene un lugar adecuado para reguardar el vital líquido. Solícita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y ladrillo para hacer lo antes posible la pila que tanto desea.
texts.en: Fidel is 54 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and their two children, who are thirteen and fifteen years old. His wife is a homemaker and he has been providing services as an assistant for two years. His home is very humble but he is very happy because he owns it and is absolutely confident that he will be able to improve its condition little by little. He wants to build a water storage tank because for now he doesn't have a proper place to keep this precious liquid. He is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and brick in order to build the tank he needs as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks to build a water tank.

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es: José es un hombre de 57 años de edad quien tiene mucha energía para trabajar y luchar por mejores condiciones. Habita en casa propia junto con su hermana quien depende de él. José se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada tanto para caballero como para dama. Habita en condiciones muy humildes y con el fin de mejorarlas ha  tomado la decisión de cambiar las paredes de su casa ya que en la actualidad son de lámina y están dañadas. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena y cemento para construir pared de su casa.
texts.en: José, 57, has much energy for work and to strive for better conditions.  He lives in his own house with his sister who depends on him.  José works selling new and used men’s and women’s clothes.  He lives in very humble conditions and aiming at improving them has decided to replace the walls in the house that are currently metal sheets and are damaged.  He’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy bricks, sand and cement to build walls at home.

loans.use: to buy supplies to build a wall.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis tiene 18 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su madre. Trabaja como motorista de transporte escolar y es así como colabora con la economía de su hogar. Junto a su madre buscan las formas y oportunidades de salir adelante. Desea terminar las  mejoras de su casa y para ello solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en construcción de un muro perimetral  para lo cual necesita comprar los materiales necesarios (arena, cemento y ladrillo) y para introducción de luz eléctrica ya que no cuenta con dicho servicio.
texts.en: Luis, 18, lives with his mother in a house he owns.  He works as a school bus driver and contributes to household economy this way.  He and his mother seek ways and opportunities to move ahead.  He wants to finish home improvements and this is why he’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy building supplies like sand, cement and bricks to erect a wall around his house and also to install electric power which the house currently lacks.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a wall and to bring electric power to his house.

loans.name: Saimir

texts.en:
This is Saimir, who is 36 years old.  He is a bar-restaurant owner who learned culinary skills in Greece and worked in Greece and Kosovo prior to opening his own place five years ago, in his hometown. He immigrated to Greece with his parents when he was a teenager and came back when he turned 31. 

Here is what he said to the loan officer: “I loved living in Greece and learning so much in every aspect of life. Greece made me a decent person and I am so glad that I had such an opportunity. Sometimes I feel more Greek than Albanian and it might sound odd but it’s true.”

Saimir’s restaurant is preferred by many locals due to his good cooked foods and his personable nature.  He wants this loan to stock up on inventory items.

loans.use: to stock up on inventory items for his bar-restaurant

loans.name: Don De Dieu Group

texts.fr: DON DE DIEU est un groupe composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Lucienne (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée de 41 ans. Lucienne n'a pas fréquenté l’école. Lucienne est mariée à un certain Bertin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Lucienne vit avec ses enfants. Les charges de ménage sont supportées par Lucienne et son mari. Pour ce faire, Lucienne vend des bois de chauffages et du soja de façon ambulante depuis cinq ans. Lucienne s'approvisionne dans sa région. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Lucienne s’associe aux autres membres du groupe DON DE DIEU pour solliciter un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Don de Dieu ["God's gift] is a group composed of three members living in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Lucienne (the one raising her hand in the photo) is 41 years old. Lucienne did not attend school. Her husband's name is Bertin. They have three dependent children, all in school. Lucienne lives together with her children. Lucienne and her husband jointly provide for household needs. In order to do so, Lucienne sells firewood and soya as a street vendor. She stocks up in her region. With the goal of bolstering her business, Lucienne, jointly with the other members of the Don de Dieu group, is seeking a third loan from ALIDe. Their prior loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: Acheter des bois de chauffage et du soja.

loans.name: Cruz Dolores

texts.es: Cruz de 32 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de  8 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace algunos años y es así como se gana la vida y colabora con la economía de su hogar.  Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para terminar de comprar los materiales necesarios (arena, cemento, hierro y ladrillo) para terminar de construir un pequeño cuarto dentro de su propiedad. Espera contar con este apoyo ya que con las lluvias las paredes se le están dañando.
texts.en:
Cruz, 32 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and her young, 8-year old son.  She has spent her time offering domestic services for some years now, and that is how she makes her living and contributes to household finances.

She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to finish buying the necessary materials (sand, cement, iron and bricks) to finish building a small room within her property.  She hopes to get this support, because the walls are getting damaged with the rain.

loans.use: to buy:  sand, cement, iron and bricks to build a room.

loans.name: Atabek

texts.ru:
Атабеку 50 лет. Он живет с женой и детьми в районе Гиссар и работает пекарем по выпечке традиционных лепешек. Выпекаются лепешки в маленьком помещении, состоящей из национальной шарообразной печи и огромного стола для раскатывания теста. Атабек около 4 года работает в этой сфере деятельности. Работа пекаря требует к себе максимального внимания и Атабек все свое внимание посвящает работе.
   Скоро в Таджикистане начнутся праздники, и главным украшением для национального стола являются таджикские лепешки. Атабек собирается закупить больше муки и дров, чтобы выпечь достаточное количество лепешек для предстоящих праздников. Для приобретения муки и дров он просит кредит, чтобы у жителей его района были на праздничном столе горячие лепешки.
texts.en: Atabek is 50 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the Gissar region and works as a baker. He specializes in traditional flatbreads. He bakes his breads in a small space, where there is a traditional round oven and an oversized table for rolling the dough. Atabek has been in this line of business for four years. Baking is a trade demanding a lot of focus, and Atabek concentrates all his efforts on work. Soon a holiday period will start in Tajikistan, and  a traditional meal is always enhanced by Tajik flatbreads. Atabek plans to stock up on flour and firewood in order to bake a sufficient quantity of flatbreads for the upcoming holidays. He is requesting a loan to buy flour and firewood so that to provide locals with fresh flatbreads for their festive meals.

loans.use: to buy flour and firewood.

loans.name: Douglas Ines

texts.es: Douglas de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre, hermanos y hermana. Tiene cuatro años de trabajar como empleado en una zapatería. Esta es su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma colabora con la economía de su hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humildes, su casa es de bahareque y madera, su deseo es construir un cuarto para lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, lámina, vara de castilla, etc. Espera poder contar con el apoyo y hacer su cuarto lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Douglas, 25, lives with his mother, brothers and sister in a house of their own.  He’s been employed in a shoe shop four years.  This is his main source of income and how he contributes to household economy.

He lives in very humble conditions.  His house is wattle and daub and wood and he wants to build a room which is why he’s asked FUSAI for a loan to buy lumber, metal sheets, iron rods, etc.  He’s hoping to be able to count on this support to build the room as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to add a room at home.

loans.name: Ismael De Jesus

texts.es: Ismael de 24 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa familiar junto a sus padres abuelo y hermano. Desde hace 4 años se dedica a la elaboración de zapatos para mujeres en el municipio donde habita, así es como se gana la vida y le ayuda a su familia en la economía del hogar. Su casa es muy humilde y desea mejorarle el techo ya que con las lluvias se ha deteriorado y es necesario hacer el cambio. Además, desea construir un pequeño dormitorio dentro del mismo terreno. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera y vara de bambú para las mejoras respectivas.
texts.en:
Ismael, 24, is single living in the family home with his parents, grandfather and brother.  He’s been working making women’s shoes in his community for the last four years.  This is how he earns his living and helps with the family economy.

His house is very humble and he wants to repair the roof that’s been damaged by the rain and needs to be replaced.  He also would like to build a small bedroom on the property.  He’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy metal sheets, lumber and bamboo stalks to make these improvements.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair the roof.

loans.name: Nazmije

texts.en:
This is Nazmije, the 49-year-old married mother of four children, being photographed inside her little one-room family house. 

She is a villager living in south-central Albania who is applying for a loan for the first time. She will use it on medical expenses for herself. 

Kindly note that she is on disability; yet, she still works and has been running her agricultural activity for 20 years. People in the village spoke very highly of her and made the best comments about her to the loan officer. 

“Being sick or not sick we must work," Nazmijee said. "There is work for everyone should they have the desire to do so. I enjoy working and I wake up very early in the mornings; planting; preparing the soil, watering and harvesting the veggies and also look after the animals and milking them, etc. Then I take the fresh produce to the city to sell. This is my daily routine, 7 days a week."

loans.use: to pay her medical expenses

loans.name: Marleni Lizet

texts.es: Marleni de 27 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 7 años de edad.  Ella se dedica  a la elaboración de zapatos para mujeres de forma artesanal desde hace tres años.  Su vivienda es muy humilde con paredes de bahareque las cuales desea repellar para evitar que los insectos aniden en las grietas de la paredes, además encementar el piso que actualmente es de tierra y de igual forma evitar por el contacto directo con la tierra futuras enfermedades que afecte a su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento y arena. Espera poder contar con este apoyo que solicita y así poder dar condiciones más seguras e higiénicas a su familia.
texts.en:
Marleni is 27 years old and lives in a house she owns with her life partner and their 7 year old daughter.  She has worked making handcrafted women's shoes for three years.  Her home is very humble, with mud walls, which she would like to plaster to avoid the insects that live in the cracks of the walls.  She would also like to cement the floor, which is currently made of dirt.  In the future, avoiding direct contact with the dirt will help prevent illnesses that affect her family.  

In order to do this work, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement and sand.  She hopes to count on this support she is requesting so that she can provide more secure and healthy conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to plaster the walls of her home and cement the floor.

loans.name: Miguel Enrique

texts.es: Miguel tiene 25 años de edad y habita en  casa familiar junto a sus padres. Es un hombre muy trabajador ya que desde muy joven sus padres le enseñaron el trabajo de la agricultura y es así como desde hace 10 años trabaja la tierra principalmente en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Desea mejorar las condiciones de la cocina de su casa ya que como se muestra en la fotografía las paredes y el techo están deteriorados por lo que solita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos de tal forma que pueda mejorar las condiciones de la cocina.
texts.en:
Miguel is 25 years old and lives in his family home with his parents.  He is a very hardworking man, because from a young age, his parents taught him how to work in agriculture.  This is how, for the past 10 years, he has worked the land, primarily growing corn and beans.

He would like to improve the condition of the kitchen in his house, because, as the photo shows, the walls and the roof have deteriorated.  That is why he is applying for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails, so that he can improve the condition of the kitchen.

loans.use: to buy:  galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to repair the kitchen.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.es: Julieta, habita en Managua y es una mujer de 51 años de edad, quien enviudó hace algunos años atrás, ella a pesar de los acontecimientos se propuso superarse profesionalmente, no situando de impedimento su edad y apoyo económico de su esposo. Actualmente trabaja por su propia cuenta en el diseño y elaboración de joyas de plata y fantasía, con lo que paga sus estudios en una universidad. Julieta se encuentra en el último periodo de su carrera de Licenciatura en Psicología, pero tiene dificultad para pagar sus gastos de titulación, solicita su crédito para tal fin, confiando que con la culminación de su carrera pueda combinar su nueva profesión con el diseño de sus productos.
texts.en:
Julieta is 51 years old and lives in Managua. She was widowed some years ago. Despite this event, she decided to obtain new professional skills, instead of seeing her age and lack of spousal financial support as an impediment. 

Julieta is currently self-employed, and she works designing and crafting silver jewellery and costume jewellery. This is how she pays her university tuition. 

Julieta is currently in the last phase of her psychology degree, but she is having difficulty paying for her graduation fees. She is requesting a loan for this reason. She is confident that, once she graduates, she will be able to combine her new profession with her current jewellery design business.

loans.use: to pay her graduation fees.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto con su compañero de vida y dos hijas de 8 años y 1 año de edad. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y así lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Su deseo es construir un pequeño cuarto en su casa para lo cual ya tiene el ladrillo y grava. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento y hierro y en la mano de obra así poder terminar su cuarto.
texts.en: Rosario, 26, lives with her spouse and two daughters aged 8 and 1 in a house of her own.  She has worked as a domestic employee for many years and this is how she brings daily bread home.  She wants to add a small room to her house for which she already has the bricks and gravel.  She’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy sand, cement and iron rods and to pay labor costs to be able to finish the room.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to build a room.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es: María de 63 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a su esposo, madre y dos hijos. Se dedica a la venta de empanadas (preparación alimenticia a base de plátano y leche) y fruta fresca. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su comunidad.  Desea hacer un pequeño cuarto dentro de su propiedad para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera, vara de castilla, y bambú para hacer la respectiva construcción. Está segura que con lo que gana del negocio y con la ayuda de su esposo logrará cancelar la deuda adquirida.
texts.en: María is 63 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband, her mother, and her two children. She sells empanadas (a plantain-and-milk-based food preparation) and fresh fruit. She works as a street vendor in the main areas of her community. She wants to build a small room inside her property, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of wood, rods, and bamboo to carry out her project. She is sure that she will be able to pay off the acquired debt with what she makes from her business and her husband's help.

loans.use: to buy wood, rods, and bamboo to build a room.

loans.name: Synia Yanira

texts.es:
Synia, sabe que para aprovechar la época de siembra es necesario tener todo listo con tiempo para evitar alguna dificultad, por lo que opta por otro crédito que le faciliten la compra de insumo agrícola (insecticida, herbicidas y abono). Anteriormente invirtió en la misma actividad económica dándole los ingresos necesarios para pagar la deuda y mejorar su economía.
Synia está dándole a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, todos están bien de salud y se mantiene el mismo grupo familiar.
texts.en: Synia knows that in order to take advantage of the planting season it’s necessary to have everything ready on time to avoid any difficulty.  This is why she’s opted for another loan that will make buying agricultural supplies (insecticide, herbicide and manure) easier.  Previously, she invested in the same economic activity earning enough income to repay the loan and to improve her economy.  Synia’s giving her family better living conditions; they are all in good health and her immediate family is the same.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Halit

texts.en: Halit is back, requesting your help again. This time, he would like a loan to build a fence around his agricultural field.

loans.use: To build a fence around his agricultural field

loans.name: Enalba

texts.es: A sus 41 años de edad y 16 de experiencia como estilista, la sala de belleza de Enalba, además de ofrecer servicios de imagen personal y profesional,  vende mercancía asociada a los servicios que ofrece,  y esto es,  porque cuando joven, adquirió experiencia en este negocio, debido a que fue empleada de uno igual. Enalba hoy,  trabaja desde las 9 de la mañana, hasta las 8 de la noche, día a día, con el fin de generar ingresos, para fortalecer la gestión de su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, en las edades de 6 y 14 años. Sus ventas las realizan de contado, desde el punto de servicios  y así mismo compra a crédito y de contado, en laboratorios que le ofrecen buenos precios. Sus principales clientes son, vecinos, familiares, amigos, y referidos que conocen sus servicios y se sienten muy satisfechos. La meta  de Enalba, mas adelante es ampliar su negocio y convertirlo en una sala de spa, pues sueña con tener su propia vivienda, y ello requiere mucho esfuerzo y dedicación;  su mayor desafío es la inestabilidad en los trabajos que afecta a su esposo actualmente. Ella está empeñada en aumentar sus ingresos, por eso acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará productos capilares, una camilla, lava cabezas, sillas para completar su spa y empezar a abonarle a su sueño de prosperidad, lo cual hará de su credikiva una inversión exitosa en el futuro. .
texts.en:
At the age of 41 and with 16 years’ experience as a hair stylist, Enalba’s beauty salon in addition to offering personal and professional image services, also sells merchandise associated with the services rendered there.  This is because when she was young she acquired experience in this business because she was employed in a similar one.

Today, Enalba works from 9 in the morning until 8 at night day to day aiming at generating income to strengthen her home consisting of her spouse and two children aged 6 and 14.

Her sales are cash and credit with respect to the services and she also makes her purchases for cash and on credit in laboratories that offer the best prices.  Her main customers are neighbors, family members, friends and referrals who know about her services and feel very satisfied.

Enalba’s goal is to expand the business and turn it into a full spa for she dreams with owning a house and to do so much effort and dedication are required.  Her greatest challenge is her husband’s current employment instability.

She’s determined to increase her income which is why she’s calling on a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy more hair products, a cot, a hair washing basin and chairs to complete her spa and start making contributions to her dream of prosperity which will make her Kiva loan successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies and equipment for her beauty supply.

loans.name: Dile

texts.en: Dile replaced the stolen milk cow thanks to your help. Now she is requesting your help again, this time requesting a loan to build a stable.

loans.use: To repair the cow stable

loans.name: Mare

texts.en:
Mare is a 53-year-old villager and a mother of seven school-aged children, six girls and a boy. Pictured is her goat herd. She started goat-keeping about four years ago, and she has loved it. “Where I come from, the Alps of Albania, almost everyone operates such an activity. It suits the geographical landscape. The difference, though, is in the milk and the homemade cheese because the taste is different,” said Mare. 

Mare lived in the Alps before coming down to the current district. She is very happy with the progress of her activity. “It has grown and the demand is growing too,” she said. Mare sells homemade cheese to locals upon prior requests and also sells baby goats. When the babies are born she doesn’t milk the goats for four months because babies can grow very healthy this way, according to Mare.

Mare wants to buy more goats with this loan.

loans.use: to add more goats to the herd

loans.name: Ryzhdi

texts.en:
Ryzhdi wants to buy a dairy cow with this loan, and he will be very appreciative to all Kiva lenders for their financial help. So far his livestock activity of about 20 years has included only goats, but now he wants to add some dairy cows. 

“I am growing older and goats need someone who is younger and faster because they run very fast, and in just five minutes you see them up on the mountain. I find myself now not strong enough to run after them,” says Ryzhdi.
 
Ryzhdi is a father of five children and lives in the south-central part of Albania.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Khusravbek

texts.ru: Хусравбек живет с женой и двумя сыновьями в районе Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Ему 34 года. Он работает мастером по ремонту холодильников. Таким видом деятельности он занимается более 5 лет. Хусравбек ремонтирует все виды холодильников, в том числе домашние, магазинные и промышленные. Город Худжанд с каждым днем развивается, открываются новые магазины и промышленности. Привозят новую технику и холодильники. До этого времени Хусравбек работал в ручную, и теперь он хочет расширить свою деятельность и приобрести аппарат по починке холодильника, с помощью которого его работа облегчится и ускорится. Для реализации задуманного Хусравбек обратился за кредитом.
texts.en:
Khusravbek lives with his wife and two sons in the B.Gafurova district of the city of Khujand. He is 34 years old. 

He works as a master repairman for refrigerators. He has been involved in this kind of work for more than five years. Khusravbek repairs all types of refrigerators, whether domestic, store or industrial. The city of Khujand is developing day by day, opening new stores and industries. They bring new machinery and refrigerators. 

Up til now, Khusravbek has worked by hand, and now he wants to expand his activities and purchase an apparatus for repairing refrigerators, with the help of which his work will be easier and faster. 

In order to realize his plans, Khusravbek applied for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase an apparatus for repairing refrigerators

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
La señora Martha  es una persona  muy  emprendedora vive con  sus   hijos en un caserío  al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la pulpería desde hace más de 12  años. 
Doña Martha el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  de maíz, frijoles, café, manteca, pan, arroz, azúcar,  etc. Con el crédito espera  el aumento de sus ventas debido a que contara con más capital fresco y  con producto que ofrecer a los clientes que visitan.
Doña Martha  espera que mejore su situación económica en el hogar y que se vea reflejado con esta inversión. En unos años, espera  que su negocio  este posicionado como la  tienda más grande y  conocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a  su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Septiembre  del 2013
texts.en:
Martha’s a very enterprising person living with her children in a settlement in southern Honduras.  Her business for the last 12 years has been a grocery store.

Martha needs the loan to buy corn, beans, coffee, shortening, bread, rice, sugar, etc.  She will increase sales with the loan because she’ll have more fresh capital and products to offer to customers that visit her.

She hopes her economic situation at home will improve thanks to this investment.  In a few years, she hopes her business will be positioned as the largest, best-known store in the zone to be able to continue supporting her family.



Choluteca, Honduras – September, 2013

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Pashke

texts.en:
Pashke has three children. Until 1997, she and her family lived in the most rural northern part of the country but when her house burned to the ground during the civil war she moved to her current location where she operates a clothing store, which she has been doing for seven years. She earns a living but is the only person supporting her family. 

Pashke is requesting a loan, which she will use to add more inventory items to sell.

loans.use: to purchase inventory items
